item.title: PRP (Physical Region Page)
item.description: PRP 출처 : https://m.blog.naver.com/PostView.nhn?blogId=eldkrpdla121&logNo=220536014853&proxyReferer=https:%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F 흠.. Pysical Region Page 말 그대로다. 혹시 모르니 위의 출처에 있는 말 그대로를 옮겨적자면, PRP contains the 64-bit physical memory page address. The lower bits (n:2) of this field indicate the offset within the memory page. N is defined by the memory page size. PRP List contains a list of PRPs with generally no offsets.
